bio: Chimezie Onyero is a cybersecurity learner at the ALX Cybersecurity and Professional Foundations Program, with a background in Engineering from the University of Nigeria, Nsukka. He is passionate about developing secure digital solutions and aims to become a leading expert in cybersecurity and technology-driven entrepreneurship over the next 5 years. Chimezie brings skills in network security, risk assessment, vulnerability management, and technical documentation, coupled with strong teamwork and communication abilities. His final year project focused on RFID research and implementation, where he applied engineering principles to design and deploy practical security solutions. Beyond academics, he actively volunteers in tech initiatives, demonstrating his commitment to innovation and community impact.
